p: Overall characteristics of the patients are presented in Table 1 while details are provided in Table S1. The content of tumor tissue in each FFPE sample ranged between 80 and 100% (median 99%) (details in Table S1). The study was approved by the local Ethics Committee of Maria Sklodowska-Curie Instituteâ€”Oncology Center in Warsaw, Poland. Each patient provided informed consent for the use of tissue samples for scientific purposes.
